title: Arai XD-5
features: PB-SNC2 (Peripherally Belted Structural Net Composite) shell

product_details.sizing_fit: Intermediate oval with Arai's signature Facial Contour System for custom-like comfort.
product_details.description: The Arai XD-5 is a premium dual-sport helmet built on Arai's legendary hand-shaped PB-SNC2 shell. It features a removable peak, VAS face shield, and 5 shell sizes for the most precise fit available in the adventure category.

sizing_fit.fit_notes: Arai's 5 shell sizes ensure the most precise external-to-internal proportion. The FCS cheek pads can be custom tuned by an Arai dealer for a bespoke fit.

safety_intelligence.analysis: Arai's hand-shaped PB-SNC2 shell emphasizes smooth external geometry, designed to redirect impact energy by encouraging the helmet to glance off obstacles rather than snag. Combined with Snell M2020 certification, this is one of the safest adventure helmets available.
